markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 48 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 [Yabin The Just (White Serpent Form)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1524) **Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 48 **Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43); (can't speak any language) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +37, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +31 **Str** +3 **Dex** +5 **Con** +6 **Int** +3 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +6 --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +28 **Will** +33 **HP** 256 **Immunities** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) **Poisonous Floodwaters** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) 10 feet Yabin is surrounded by magically generated waist-deep poisonous waters. Enemies that enter the water are exposed to his white serpent venom. The aura is difficult terrain for creatures without a swim Speed. Every time Yabin Casts a Spell, the aura increases in radius by 5 feet, up to a maximum of 60 feet. He can activate or suppress this aura as a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.
**Toughest Teamwork: Envenomed Strike** **Trigger** An ally within 20 feet makes a Strike that would deal piercing or slashing damage and hasn't yet rolled the attack roll; **Effect** Yabin spits venom on his ally's weapon. The Strike, if it hits, also exposes the target to Yabin's white serpent venom. If the Strike misses, the venom evaporates off immediately. --- **Speed** 25 feet, burrow 20 feet, swim 60 feet **Melee** fangs +33 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d10+11 piercing plus white serpent venom **Ranged** venom +33 ([range 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 4d8+8 poison plus white serpent venom **Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 40, attack +32 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **5th** [Chromatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=37), [Cloak of Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=41), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147) (4 slots) - **6th** [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Spellwrack](/Spells.aspx?ID=298) (4 slots) - **7th** [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) (4 slots) - **8th** [Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73), [Horrid Wilting](/Spells.aspx?ID=152), [Prismatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=234), [Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267) (4 slots) - **9th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224) (4 slots) **White Serpent Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [Virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162)) **Saving Throw** DC 36 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison (1 round); **Stage 2** 5d6 poison and [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) (1 round); **Stage 3** 5d6 poison and [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) (1 round) **Rattling Magic** Yabin substitutes all spellcasting components when Casting a Spell with rattling of his tail. This has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.
name: Yabin The Just (White Serpent Form)

text: Yabin The Just (White Serpent Form) Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 48 Unspecific Lore : DC 46 Specific Lore : DC 43 Yabin The Just (White Serpent Form) Source Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 48 Perception +28; darkvision Languages Common, Nagaji, Tengu, Tien; (can't speak any language) Skills Acrobatics +31, Athletics +35, Diplomacy +31, Intimidation +37, Occultism +31 Str +3 Dex +5 Con +6 Int +3 Wis +2 Cha +6 --- AC 39 Fort +30 Ref +28 Will +33 HP 256 Immunities poison Poisonous Floodwaters (aura, poison, water) 10 feet Yabin is surrounded by magically generated waist-deep poisonous waters. Enemies that enter the water are exposed to his white serpent venom. The aura is difficult terrain for creatures without a swim Speed. Every time Yabin Casts a Spell, the aura increases in radius by 5 feet, up to a maximum of 60 feet. He can activate or suppress this aura as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. Toughest Teamwork: Envenomed Strike Reaction Trigger An ally within 20 feet makes a Strike that would deal piercing or slashing damage and hasn't yet rolled the attack roll; Effect Yabin spits venom on his ally's weapon. The Strike, if it hits, also exposes the target to Yabin's white serpent venom. If the Strike misses, the venom evaporates off immediately. --- Speed 25 feet, burrow 20 feet, swim 60 feet Melee Single Action fangs +33 (Finesse, reach 10 feet), Damage 4d10+11 piercing plus white serpent venom Ranged Single Action venom +33 (range 20 feet), Damage 4d8+8 poison plus white serpent venom Arcane Spontaneous Spells DC 40, attack +32 - Cantrips (9th) Acid Splash, Detect Magic, Light, Shield, Telekinetic Projectile - 5th Chromatic Wall, Cloak of Colors, Freedom of Movement, Haste (4 slots) - 6th Chain Lightning, Feeblemind, Fireball, Spellwrack (4 slots) - 7th Disintegrate, Eclipse Burst, Mask of Terror, True Seeing (4 slots) - 8th Disappearance, Horrid Wilting, Prismatic Wall, Scintillating Pattern (4 slots) - 9th Dispel Magic, Magic Missile, Polar Ray (4 slots) White Serpent Venom (Poison, Virulent) Saving Throw DC 36 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 3d6 poison (1 round); Stage 2 5d6 poison and dazzled (1 round); Stage 3 5d6 poison and blinded (1 round) Rattling Magic Yabin substitutes all spellcasting components when Casting a Spell with rattling of his tail. This has the concentrate trait.
